p: Measurements of the fluorescence intensity at 670 nm, I 670( t), after addition of ATP-enabled monitoring the kinetics of the ATP-dependent DNA unwinding by OBP using fluorescent DNA substrates. The kinetic curves for the ATP-dependent unwinding of the (S3 + S7 + S8) oligomer in the absence and presence of Pt-bis-netropsin are shown in Figure 12 (panels A and C).
